name: MysticDailyDevotionals
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Je Tuan Jones is a Spiritual Teacher, Mentor, and Healer who has worked with hundred of people. In 2018 she started the Divine Spark Academy to give people access to an affordable and dynamic mystic education. The Divine Spark Academy is a high touch online school that teaches Metaphysical and Magical principles to students from all around the world. The Mystic Daily Devotionals Flash Briefings are Je Tuan’s opportunity to share her extensive education and personal healing lessons with you. This is a Daily Devotional for Spiritualists to help you co-create a peaceful and enlightened day. Get your daily dose of enrichment today.You will get Devotionals based on but not limited to:TarotArchetypesGene KeysDeitiesChakrasMoon CyclesNumerologyAstrologyCrystalsHerbsAnd much more.You can keep up with Je Tuan Here:www.jetuanjones.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
